column1: A Mass of Christian Burial for Mary Florence Vetrano Moss will be held at 11:00 a.m. on Wednesday
column3: 2015 at Immaculate Conception Minor Basilica. Visitation will be held that morning at the Church Hall starting at 9:30 a.m. with a Rosary to be recited at the beginning of the visitation. Interment will follow at Memory Lawn Cemetery.
